content.description: The x axis ranges from negative 2 to 4 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right:
content.question: The curve enters the window at (negative 1.5 comma negative 3.5). The curve increases to reach a high point at (negative 1 comma 0). The curve decreases to reach a low point at (negative 0.4 comma negative 0.8). The curve increases to pass through the origin and reach a high point at (1 comma 3.2). The curve decreases to exit the window at (3.5 comma negative 3.5). The curve appears to be symmetric about the vertical line x = 1. ​The graph of the polynomial function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is shown.
